mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_transport(transport_id,emp_id,is_type, start_provinceid,start_cityid,start_areaid, end_provinceid,end_cityid,end_areaid, start_time,end_time,detail,car_length_id,car_type_id,car_num,person,tel,dateline,lat,lng,car_pic) VALUES (#{transport_id},#{emp_id},#{is_type}, #{start_provinceid},#{start_cityid},#{start_areaid}, #{end_provinceid},#{end_cityid},#{end_areaid}, #{start_time},#{end_time},#{detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{car_length_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{car_type_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{person},#{tel},#{dateline},#{lat, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lng, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{car_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT lapp.*, lemp.emp_name as emp_name, lleng.car_length_name as car_length_name, lcartype.car_type_name as car_type_name, ,lp.pname as start_pname,lcity.cityName as start_cityName,larea.areaName as start_areaName ,lpp.pname as end_pname,lcityp.cityName as end_cityName,lareap.areaName as end_areaName
from car_transport lapp LEFT JOIN lx_emp lemp ON lemp.emp_id = lapp.emp_id LEFT JOIN province lp ON lp.provinceid = lapp.start_provinceid LEFT JOIN city lcity ON lcity.cityid = lapp.start_cityid LEFT JOIN area larea ON larea.areaid = lapp.start_areaid
LEFT JOIN province lpp ON lpp.provinceid = lapp.end_provinceid LEFT JOIN city lcityp ON lcityp.cityid = lapp.end_cityid LEFT JOIN area lareap ON lareap.areaid = lapp.end_areaid
LEFT JOIN car_length lleng ON lleng.car_length_id = lapp.car_length_id LEFT JOIN car_type lleng ON lcartype.car_type_id = lapp.car_type_id
where lapp.transport_id=#{transport_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE car_transport SET is_use=#{is_use} WHERE transport_id=#{transport_id}
UPDATE car_transport SET is_del=#{is_del} WHERE transport_id=#{transport_id}
